mapper.select: select * from t_buckets where is_delete = 0 and buckets_name = #{name} limit 1
select count(id) from t_buckets where is_delete = 0 and mount_point like concat(#{path}, '%') limit 1

select bk.*,res.res_name from t_buckets as bk join t_resources as res on res.id = bk.res_id
join t_policies_rule as pr on pr.buckets_id = bk.id join t_resources_user_group as rug on rug.res_id = bk.res_id left join t_user_group_bind as ugb on ugb.user_group_id = rug.user_group_id
and bk.is_delete = 0
and bk.id = #{id}
and bk.buckets_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
and ( pr.user_id = #{uid} or (bk.permissions != 0 and bk.permissions_scope = 2) or (bk.permissions != 0 and bk.permissions_scope = 1 and ugb.user_id = #{uid}) )
and bk.is_delete = 0
group by bk.id

SELECT bk.*, gu.user_id, pr.action, pr.effect FROM t_buckets AS bk JOIN t_resources AS res ON res.id = bk.res_id LEFT JOIN t_policies_rule AS pr ON pr.buckets_id = bk.id AND pr.user_id = #{uid} LEFT JOIN (select ugb.user_id, rug.res_id from t_resources_user_group as rug join t_user_group_bind as ugb on ugb.user_group_id = rug.user_group_id where ugb.user_id = #{uid}) as gu on gu.res_id = bk.res_id WHERE bk.is_delete = 0 AND bk.id = #{bkId} group by bk.id
